com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core.Map

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core.Map.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph<PfNode>, IndexedGraph<PfNode>, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, IndexedGraph<PfNode>
    A map stores nine chunks as part of a bigger map. It also contains the entities.

      • Map

        public Map(java.io.File name,
           Generator generator,
           int saveSlot)
    throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a map.
        Parameters:
        name - if available on disk it will load the meta file
        generator - the generator used for generating new chunks
        saveSlot -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if there is no full read/write access to the map file

      • hiddenSurfaceDetection

        public void hiddenSurfaceDetection(Camera camera,
                                   int chunkX,
                                   int chunkY)
        performs a simple viewFrustum check by looking at the direct neighbours.
        Parameters:
        camera - the camera which is used for the limits. Gets stored globally so only one camera can be used. Calling this method more then once ith different cameras overwrites the result.
        chunkX - chunk coordinate
        chunkY - chunk coordinate

        Parameters:

        y - coordinate
        z - coordinate
        Returns:

        chunkY -
        Returns:

      • getEntitys

        public <type extends AbstractEntity> java.util.ArrayList<type> getEntitys(java.lang.Class<type> filter)
        Find every instance of a special class. E.g. find every AbstractCharacter. They must be spawned to appear in the results.
        Type Parameters:
        type - the class you want to filter.
        Parameters:
        filter - the class you want to filter.
        Returns:
        a list with the entitys

        Parameters:
